description:
Healers and coaches often find that change is a difficult proposition for clients. Change does not happen as quickly as they would hope, if at all.

Even worse, there is something that they can't even seem to find which seems to hold their clients back.

In this course, learn the basics of trance in order to work with clients in these powerful other-than-conscious modality states.

This is an introductory course which does not explain the nuts and bolts of actually using trance, but which prepares you with a basic understanding of the concepts and ideas between trance and healing.

I define basic terms and provide a pathway for actually learning and applying the principles in further courses.

This course is a theoretical introduction.
title: Using Altered States and Language for Pleasure and Healing
